title: CAIA Phase 2 Architecture Strategy: 70% Reuse with Strategic Enhancements
description: Analysis shows existing CAIA ecosystem covers 60-70% of Phase 2 requirements. Key decision: Build on existing MessageBus, CC Orchestrator, and Memory modules rather than rebuilding. Focus new development on distributed state management, cache hierarchy, and monitoring suite.

title: CAIA to GCP Migration Technical Analysis
description: Created comprehensive technical migration mapping from CAIA monorepo to GCP cloud-native architecture with detailed code replacement strategy

title: CAIA Frontend GCP Migration Strategy Created
description: Developed comprehensive frontend migration strategy for CAIA's cloud-first approach using GCP services including Firebase Hosting, Cloud Run, Firebase Auth, and Firestore. Strategy includes 7-week timeline with performance targets and cost analysis.

title: Complete .env to GCP Service Mapping Created
description: Analyzed 31 unique integrations across CAIA ecosystem and mapped each to GCP equivalents. Key findings: 70% cost reduction (/month savings), 90% of services have native GCP replacements, enhanced security through Secret Manager, better performance and global scale. Created comprehensive migration guide with scripts and phased approach.
